articles.title: Twitter makes another BIG change, removes THIS from PM Modi and Amit Shah's account - msnNOW
articles.description: Twitter: Since becoming the owner of Twitter, Elon Musk has been making many changes to it. He released the Blue Subscription feature. Apart from this, the tick that appears in front of the names of the people is also given in three colours.
articles.content:

articles.title: Yes Bank offloads stressed assets worth Rs 48,000 crore to JC Flowers ARC - Firstpost
articles.description: Yes Bank’s board approved the declaration of JC Flowers ARC as the winner of the Swiss Challenge process on 20 September.
articles.content: Yes Bank has concluded assigning its stressed asset loan portfolio to JC Flowers Asset Reconstruction Company (ARC). The completion of the assignment of Yes Banks non-performing assets amounts to Rs … [+2073 chars]
